code: import{EventEmitter,Platform}from'expo-modules-core';import PushTokenManager from"./PushTokenManager";var tokenEmitter=new EventEmitter(PushTokenManager);var newTokenEventName='onDevicePushToken';export function addPushTokenListener(listener){var wrappingListener=function wrappingListener(_ref){var devicePushToken=_ref.devicePushToken;return listener({data:devicePushToken,type:Platform.OS});};return tokenEmitter.addListener(newTokenEventName,wrappingListener);}export function removePushTokenSubscription(subscription){tokenEmitter.removeSubscription(subscription);}
